Kassiopeia  3
Monte Carlo simulation program specializing in tracking particles in electric and magnetic fields

TestHydrogenInteraction.cxx

30 using namespace Kassiopeia;
31 using namespace katrin;
32 
33 int main( int /*anArgc*/, char** /*anArgv*/ )
34 {
35  // read in xml file
36  KXMLTokenizer tXMLTokenizer;
37  KVariableProcessor tVariableProcessor;
38  KFormulaProcessor tFormulaProcessor;
39  KIncludeProcessor tIncludeProcessor;
40  KLoopProcessor tLoopProcessor;
41  KConditionProcessor tConditionProcessor;
42  KTagProcessor tTagProcessor;
43  KElementProcessor tElementProcessor;
44 
45  tVariableProcessor.InsertAfter( &tXMLTokenizer );
46  tFormulaProcessor.InsertAfter( &tVariableProcessor );
47  tIncludeProcessor.InsertAfter( &tFormulaProcessor );
48  tLoopProcessor.InsertAfter( &tIncludeProcessor );
49  tConditionProcessor.InsertAfter( &tLoopProcessor );
50  tTagProcessor.InsertAfter( &tConditionProcessor );
51  tElementProcessor.InsertAfter( &tTagProcessor );
52 
53  double tLowEnergy = 1;
54  double tHighEnergy = 18601;
55  double tEnergyStepSize = .1;
56  double tLength = 1.0;
57 
58  KSIntDensityConstant* tDensityCalc = new KSIntDensityConstant();
59  tDensityCalc->SetPressure(1.e-4); // pascal (*100 for mbar)
60  tDensityCalc->SetTemperature(300.); // kelvin
61 
62  KSIntCalculator* elasticCalculator = new KSIntCalculatorHydrogenElastic();
63  elasticCalculator->SetName( "hydrogen_elastic" );
64  elasticCalculator->SetTag( "hydrogen" );
65 
66  KSIntCalculator* vibCalculator = new KSIntCalculatorHydrogenVib();
67  vibCalculator->SetName( "hydrogen_vib" );
68  vibCalculator->SetTag( "hydrogen" );
69 
70  KSIntCalculator* rot02Calculator = new KSIntCalculatorHydrogenRot02();
71  rot02Calculator->SetName( "hydrogen_rot02" );
72  rot02Calculator->SetTag( "hydrogen" );
73 
74  KSIntCalculator* rot13Calculator = new KSIntCalculatorHydrogenRot13();
75  rot13Calculator->SetName( "hydrogen_rot13" );
76  rot13Calculator->SetTag( "hydrogen" );
77 
78  KSIntCalculator* rot20Calculator = new KSIntCalculatorHydrogenRot20();
79  rot20Calculator->SetName( "hydrogen_rot20" );
80  rot20Calculator->SetTag( "hydrogen" );
81 
82  KSIntCalculator* excBIntCalculator = new KSIntCalculatorHydrogenExcitationB();
83  excBIntCalculator->SetName( "hydrogen_excB" );
84  excBIntCalculator->SetTag( "hydrogen" );
85 
86  KSIntCalculator* excCIntCalculator = new KSIntCalculatorHydrogenExcitationC();
87  excCIntCalculator->SetName( "hydrogen_excC" );
88  excCIntCalculator->SetTag( "hydrogen" );
89 
90  KSIntCalculator* diss10IntCalculator = new KSIntCalculatorHydrogenDissoziation10();
91  diss10IntCalculator->SetName( "hydrogen_diss10" );
92  diss10IntCalculator->SetTag( "hydrogen" );
93 
94  KSIntCalculator* diss15IntCalculator = new KSIntCalculatorHydrogenDissoziation15();
95  diss15IntCalculator->SetName( "hydrogen_diss15" );
96  diss15IntCalculator->SetTag( "hydrogen" );
97 
98  KSIntCalculator* excElIntCalculator = new KSIntCalculatorHydrogenExcitationElectronic();
99  excElIntCalculator->SetName( "hydrogen_excEl");
100  excElIntCalculator->SetTag( "hydrogen" );
101 
102  KSIntCalculator* IonIntCalculator = new KSIntCalculatorHydrogenIonisation();
103  IonIntCalculator->SetName( "hydrogen_ionisation" );
104  IonIntCalculator->SetTag( "hydrogen" );
105 
106 
107  // get stuff from toolbox == fuck the toolbox
108  KSIntScattering* tScattering = new KSIntScattering();
109  tScattering->SetDensity( tDensityCalc );
110  tScattering->SetSplit( false );
111 
112  tScattering->AddCalculator(elasticCalculator);
113  tScattering->AddCalculator(vibCalculator);
114  tScattering->AddCalculator(rot02Calculator);
115  tScattering->AddCalculator(rot13Calculator);
116  tScattering->AddCalculator(rot20Calculator);
117  tScattering->AddCalculator(excBIntCalculator);
118  tScattering->AddCalculator(excCIntCalculator);
119  tScattering->AddCalculator(diss10IntCalculator);
120  tScattering->AddCalculator(diss15IntCalculator);
121  tScattering->AddCalculator(excElIntCalculator);
122  tScattering->AddCalculator(IonIntCalculator);
123 
124 
125  tScattering->Initialize();
126 
127  // initialize root
128  TApplication tApplication( "Test Interaction", 0, NULL );
129 
130  TCanvas tCrossSectionCanvas( "crosssection_canvas", "cross section" );
131  TGraph tCrossSectionGraph;
132  TGraph tIonCrossSectionGraph;
133  TGraph tElCrossSectionGraph;
134  TGraph tVibCrossSectionGraph;
135  TGraph trot02CrossSectionGraph;
136  TGraph trot13CrossSectionGraph;
137  TGraph trot20CrossSectionGraph;
138  TGraph texcBCrossSectionGraph;
139  TGraph texcCCrossSectionGraph;
140  TGraph tdiss10CrossSectionGraph;
141  TGraph tdiss15rossSectionGraph;
142  TGraph texcElCrossSectionGraph;
143 
144  TCanvas tEnergyLossCanvas( "energyloss_canvas", "energy loss" );
145  TH1D tEnergyLossHisto("energy loss","energy loss",1000,-0.2,100);
146 
147 
148  TCanvas tScatteringAngleCanvas( "scatteringangle_canvas", "scattering_angle" );
149  TH1D tScatteringAngleHisto("scattering angle","scattering angle",100,0.,180.);
150 
151 
152  // make particles
153  KSParticle* tInitialParticle = KSParticleFactory::GetInstance().Create( 11 );
154  KSParticle* tFinalParticle = KSParticleFactory::GetInstance().Create( 11 );
155  KSParticle* tInteractionParticle = KSParticleFactory::GetInstance().Create( 11 );
156  KSParticleQueue tSecondaries;
157 
158  tInitialParticle->SetLength( 0.00 );
159  tFinalParticle->SetLength( tLength );
160 
161 
162  KThreeVector tDirection = KThreeVector(0.,0.,1.);
163 
164  double tEnergy = tLowEnergy;
165  int tIndex = 0;
166  while ( tEnergy <= tHighEnergy )
167  {
168  tInitialParticle->SetMomentum(tDirection);
169  tInteractionParticle->SetMomentum(tDirection);
170  tFinalParticle->SetMomentum(tDirection);
171 
172  tInitialParticle->SetKineticEnergy_eV( tEnergy );
173  tInteractionParticle->SetKineticEnergy_eV( tEnergy );
174  tFinalParticle->SetKineticEnergy_eV( tEnergy );
175 
176  double tAverageCrossSection = 0.;
177  tScattering->CalculateAverageCrossSection( *tInitialParticle, *tFinalParticle, tAverageCrossSection);
178 // std::cout << "total cross section: " << tAverageCrossSection << std::endl;
179  tCrossSectionGraph.SetPoint ( tIndex, tEnergy, tAverageCrossSection );
180  double tCrossSection = 0.;
181  IonIntCalculator->CalculateCrossSection(*tInitialParticle, tCrossSection);
182  tIonCrossSectionGraph.SetPoint( tIndex, tEnergy, tCrossSection);
183 // std::cout << "ion cross section " << tCrossSection << std::endl;
184 
185  elasticCalculator->CalculateCrossSection(*tInitialParticle, tCrossSection);
186  tElCrossSectionGraph.SetPoint( tIndex, tEnergy, tCrossSection);
187 
188  vibCalculator->CalculateCrossSection(*tInitialParticle, tCrossSection);
189  tVibCrossSectionGraph.SetPoint( tIndex, tEnergy, tCrossSection);
190  rot02Calculator->CalculateCrossSection(*tInitialParticle, tCrossSection);
191  trot02CrossSectionGraph.SetPoint( tIndex, tEnergy, tCrossSection);
192  rot13Calculator->CalculateCrossSection(*tInitialParticle, tCrossSection);
193  trot13CrossSectionGraph.SetPoint( tIndex, tEnergy, tCrossSection);
194  rot20Calculator->CalculateCrossSection(*tInitialParticle, tCrossSection);
195  trot20CrossSectionGraph.SetPoint( tIndex, tEnergy, tCrossSection);
196  excBIntCalculator->CalculateCrossSection(*tInitialParticle, tCrossSection);
197  texcBCrossSectionGraph.SetPoint( tIndex, tEnergy, tCrossSection);
198 // std::cout << "excB cross section " << tCrossSection << std::endl;
199  excCIntCalculator->CalculateCrossSection(*tInitialParticle, tCrossSection);
200  texcCCrossSectionGraph.SetPoint( tIndex, tEnergy, tCrossSection);
201 // std::cout << "excC cross section " << tCrossSection << std::endl;
202  diss10IntCalculator->CalculateCrossSection(*tInitialParticle, tCrossSection);
203  tdiss10CrossSectionGraph.SetPoint( tIndex, tEnergy, tCrossSection);
204 // std::cout << "diss10 cross section " << tCrossSection << std::endl;
205  diss15IntCalculator->CalculateCrossSection(*tInitialParticle, tCrossSection);
206  tdiss15rossSectionGraph.SetPoint( tIndex, tEnergy, tCrossSection);
207 // std::cout << "diss15 cross section " << tCrossSection << std::endl;
208  excElIntCalculator->CalculateCrossSection(*tInitialParticle, tCrossSection);
209  texcElCrossSectionGraph.SetPoint( tIndex, tEnergy, tCrossSection);
210 // std::cout << "excEl cross section " << tCrossSection << std::endl;
211 
212  if(tAverageCrossSection > 0.)
213  {
214  tScattering->DiceCalculator( tAverageCrossSection );
215  tScattering->ExecuteInteraction( *tInteractionParticle, *tFinalParticle, tSecondaries);
216  tEnergyLossHisto.Fill( tInteractionParticle->GetKineticEnergy_eV() - tFinalParticle->GetKineticEnergy_eV() );
217  tScatteringAngleHisto.Fill( tFinalParticle->GetPolarAngleToZ() );
218  }
219  tEnergy += tEnergyStepSize;
220  tIndex++;
221 
222  mainmsg(eNormal) << "Step: " << tIndex << " Energy: " << tEnergy << reom;
223  }
224 
225  // show plots
226 
227  tCrossSectionCanvas.cd( 0 );
228  tCrossSectionGraph.SetMarkerColor( kRed );
229  tCrossSectionGraph.SetMarkerStyle( 20 );
230  tCrossSectionGraph.SetMarkerSize( 0.5 );
231  tCrossSectionGraph.SetLineWidth( 1 );
232  tCrossSectionGraph.SetTitle( "cross section" );
233  tCrossSectionGraph.GetXaxis()->SetTitle( "Energy in eV" );
234  tCrossSectionGraph.GetYaxis()->SetTitle( "cross section in 1/m^2" );
235  tCrossSectionGraph.Draw( "AP" );
236 
237  tIonCrossSectionGraph.SetMarkerColor( kGreen );
238  tIonCrossSectionGraph.SetMarkerStyle( 20 );
239  tIonCrossSectionGraph.SetMarkerSize( 0.5 );
240  tIonCrossSectionGraph.SetLineWidth( 1 );
241  tIonCrossSectionGraph.Draw("same");
242 
243 
244  tElCrossSectionGraph.SetMarkerColor( kBlue );
245  tElCrossSectionGraph.SetMarkerStyle( 20 );
246  tElCrossSectionGraph.SetMarkerSize( 0.5 );
247  tElCrossSectionGraph.SetLineWidth( 1 );
248  tElCrossSectionGraph.Draw("same");
249 
250 
251  tVibCrossSectionGraph.SetMarkerColor( kYellow );
252  tVibCrossSectionGraph.SetMarkerStyle( 20 );
253  tVibCrossSectionGraph.SetMarkerSize( 0.5 );
254  tVibCrossSectionGraph.SetLineWidth( 1 );
255  tVibCrossSectionGraph.Draw("same");
256

258  trot02CrossSectionGraph.SetMarkerStyle( 20 );
259  trot02CrossSectionGraph.SetMarkerSize( 0.5 );
260  trot02CrossSectionGraph.SetLineWidth( 1 );
261  trot02CrossSectionGraph.Draw("same");
262

264  trot13CrossSectionGraph.SetMarkerStyle( 20 );
265  trot13CrossSectionGraph.SetMarkerSize( 0.5 );
266  trot13CrossSectionGraph.SetLineWidth( 1 );
267  trot13CrossSectionGraph.Draw("same");
268

271  trot20CrossSectionGraph.SetMarkerSize( 0.5 );
272  trot20CrossSectionGraph.SetLineWidth( 1 );
273  trot20CrossSectionGraph.Draw("same");
274

284  texcCCrossSectionGraph.SetMarkerSize( 0.5 );
285  texcCCrossSectionGraph.SetLineWidth( 1 );

292  tdiss10CrossSectionGraph.Draw("same");
293

298  tdiss15rossSectionGraph.Draw("same");
299 
300  texcElCrossSectionGraph.SetMarkerColor( kYellow );

302  texcElCrossSectionGraph.SetMarkerSize( 0.5 );
303  texcElCrossSectionGraph.SetLineWidth( 1 );
304  texcElCrossSectionGraph.Draw("same");
305 
306  tEnergyLossCanvas.cd( 0 );
307  tEnergyLossHisto.SetMarkerColor( kRed );
308  tEnergyLossHisto.SetMarkerStyle( 20 );
309  tEnergyLossHisto.SetMarkerSize( 0.5 );
310  tEnergyLossHisto.SetLineWidth( 1 );
311  tEnergyLossHisto.SetTitle( "energy loss" );
312  tEnergyLossHisto.GetXaxis()->SetTitle( "Energy loss in eV" );
313  tEnergyLossHisto.Draw();
314 
315 
316  tScatteringAngleCanvas.cd( 0 );
317  tScatteringAngleHisto.SetMarkerColor( kRed );
318  tScatteringAngleHisto.SetMarkerStyle( 20 );
319  tScatteringAngleHisto.SetMarkerSize( 0.5 );
320  tScatteringAngleHisto.SetLineWidth( 1 );
321  tScatteringAngleHisto.SetTitle( "scattering angle" );
322  tScatteringAngleHisto.GetXaxis()->SetTitle( "scattering angle in degree" );
323  tScatteringAngleHisto.Draw();
324 
325 
326  tApplication.Run();
327 
328 
329  return 0;
330 }
